text:
Zlatan Ibrahimovic in-line for huge Manchester United bonus after breaking 20 goal mark this season in the hat When is the Europa League last 16 draw? Manchester United through and Tottenham hope to join them - all you need to know QUICK AS A FLASH Porto 0, Juventus 2: Supersubs Marco Pjaco and Dani Alves both score two minutes apart with their FIRST touches to seal the win BLUE INK Eden Hazard is Real Madrid's top summer target - but Chelsea star drops huge hint he will stay at Stamford Bridge Saints go East Southampton targeted by Far East investors as China's largest investment bank lines up £225million bid Getty Images Victor Lindelof was close to Old Trafford in January, but could move in summer 
Milan looked on course to fight for the Scudetto after a 1-0 victory over the leaders . 
However, a shocking dip in form has seen them drop to eighth and ten points of the Champions League places. 
Vincenzo Montella wants a marquee signing as a signal of their intent — and beating United to the signing of Lindelof would show the world they are once again big players in the transfer market. Getty Images AC Milan’s last Champions League encounter was against Atletico Madrid in 2014 Getty Images AC Milan boss Vincenzo Montella is desperate to make big-name signing Getty Images Alexis Sanchez is another of the big names on AC Milan radar in summer 
From 1987 to 1992, they broke the world transfer record three times. 
But in the past decade, they have become more akin to selling their top assets for big profits. 
Alexis Sanchez is another big-name player Milan are looking at in the summer. Manchester United fans reply to the dancing St Etienne fans during away leg in France
